Gemini Mix Visualizer

artwork and video
2023
object

To showcase typefaces from Sharp Type Foundry, I created an hour long video to accompany a music mix by Ian Kim Judd.

More on sharptype.co ↗

Thanks to Elliott Cost, who I adapted energy spheres from. Also to Theodore Jahng, Megan Pai, Peter Pelberg, Chino Kim, and Jason Protell. Guiding quote by C.S. Lewis.
